general.welcome: Welcome to Opt-AI - Your AI-powered SEO assistant
general.slogan: Optimize your website with artificial intelligence

homepage.features_subtitle: Discover what makes Opt-AI the premium choice for SEO optimization
homepage.meta_analysis_desc: Comprehensive review of your page titles, descriptions, and meta tags.
homepage.content_analysis_desc: Evaluate your content structure, readability, and keyword optimization.
homepage.technical_seo_desc: Identify technical issues affecting your site's search performance.
homepage.ai_insights_desc: Get intelligent recommendations powered by advanced AI analysis.
homepage.step1_desc: Simply enter any website URL you want to analyze for SEO performance.
homepage.step2_desc: Our AI engine performs a comprehensive analysis of your site's SEO factors.
homepage.step3_desc: Receive detailed reports with prioritized recommendations to improve your rankings.
homepage.testimonial1: "Opt-AI helped us improve our e-commerce site's rankings dramatically. The AI recommendations were spot-on and easy to implement."
homepage.testimonial2: "As a content creator, Opt-AI has been invaluable for optimizing my blog posts. The semantic analysis feature is a game-changer!"
homepage.testimonial3: "We've tried many SEO tools, but Opt-AI's recommendations are actually actionable. Our traffic increased by 43% in just 3 months."
homepage.start_improving: Start improving your search engine rankings with AI-powered insights today.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.meta_description: Manage your SEO analyses and track your SEO performance
dashboard.no_analysis: You haven't performed any analysis yet
dashboard.upgrade_message: Upgrade to unlock advanced analyses and additional features.

analyze.title: Analyze your website
analyze.subtitle: Get a complete SEO analysis of your website
analyze.meta_description: Analysis of meta tags, titles and descriptions
analyze.deep_description: Complete analysis with advanced AI recommendations
analyze.subscription_required: Subscription required for this analysis type
analyze.url_hint: Enter the full URL including http:// or https://
analyze.meta_card_desc: Quick analysis of essential meta tags for search engine ranking
analyze.partial_card_desc: Analysis of visible content and important on-page factors
analyze.complete_card_desc: Full technical analysis including speed and structure
analyze.deep_ai_card_desc: Semantic analysis and advanced AI optimization advice
analyze.please_wait: Please wait while we analyze your website
analyze.meta_description: Analyze your website and get detailed SEO recommendations to improve your search engine ranking

report.title: SEO Analysis Report
report.chat_with_ai: Chat with AI about this analysis
report.reanalyze_description: After making changes, run a new analysis to track improvements.
report.upgrade_description: Get a more detailed analysis with our premium plans.
report.ai_help_description: Use our AI assistant for personalized advice.
report.your_title_is_too_long: Your title is too long. Keep it under 60 characters for better visibility in search results.
report.add_meta_description: Add a meta description tag to improve CTR in search results.
report.while_not_critical: While not critical for SEO, meta keywords tags can help with site organization.

pricing.title: Plans and pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs
pricing.choose_plan: Choose the plan that fits your needs
pricing.free_description: Perfect for beginners wanting to explore the SEO basics
pricing.basic_description: For bloggers and small businesses looking to improve visibility
pricing.premium_description: For businesses wanting to optimize their SEO strategy
pricing.enterprise_description: For agencies and large companies with specific needs
pricing.faq_switch_plans_answer: Yes, you can switch plans at any time. Changes will take effect immediately.
pricing.faq_payment_methods: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq_payment_methods_answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and PayPal.
pricing.faq_contract_answer: No, all our plans are contract-free. You can cancel anytime.
pricing.faq_refunds_answer: We offer a full refund within 14 days of your subscription if you're not satisfied.
pricing.faq_custom_solutions_answer: Yes, please contact us to discuss your specific needs.
pricing.meta_description: Discover our flexible pricing plans for professional SEO analysis
